channel.title: Recruting Rangers and Mages!
channel.description: Oke, I am a lvl 89 range with 89 range :P And since most full runers in f2p on me coz I don't hit thru their armor much, am recruiting rangers and mages around my lvl 85-90. Must have 70+ range of ur a ranger and +59 magic if ur a mage. We will be luring our killz mostly. How to do this? We go to lvl 25 just upwards of giants. Make a DD(death dot) and one person goz to lure ppl that way. It works from experience(killed over 10 full runes tis way.) All Mages are required to bind at all times to ensure that the kills don't get away. Experience in binding is needed ppl. Try counting 1.5 secs before recasting bind after he starts running. All rangers attack whoever we attacking and mages fire blast. My ingame name is x facta PM in game or add me hotmail@msn.com
